She's the vision of hope for this country right now. She embodies everything that Barack Obama was trying to say, that we have to be better than we are. Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama .`` He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . And Aaron Rodgers is getting even more MVP treatment tonight, where you can catch him on The Late Show with David Letterman . The show starts at 10:35 p.m. tonight, right after Channel
